text: The List of FlixTrain services in Germany provides a list of all railway services of FlixTrain (FLX) in Germany. The information is up to date to December 2019. ==2020 timetable (15.12.19 – 12.12.20)== {| class="wikitable" ! Line ! Route ! KBS ! Frequency ! Material ! Operator !
